10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Imran bin Husain narrated that :the Prophet said: "Indeed your brother An-Najashi has died. So stand to perform Salat for him." He (Imran) said: "We stood and lined up just as the deceased is lined up for, and we prayed for him just as the deceased is prayed for

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم عَلَى النَّجَاشِيِّ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Prophet (ﷺ) Performing Salat For (The Death Of) An-Najashi
